mapper.select: /* TODO : 데이터 없음, db 설계 미완료*/ SELECT '10' AS MPY_BSDT , '2' AS SELL_TP_CD , '렌탈' AS SELL_TP_NM , '비데' AS PRD_GRP , '비데(KW-BK1W1)' AS PD_NM , '2010-1484-21' AS BND_CNTR_REF_ID , '정선화' AS CST_KNM , '1' AS DLQ_MCN , '20220925' AS CNTR_RSG_DT , 25660 AS OJ_AMT , 10040 AS OJ_DT , 35700 AS OJ_BLAM FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '20' AS MPY_BSDT , '3' AS SELL_TP_CD , '멤버십' AS SELL_TP_NM , '정기멤버십' AS PRD_GRP , '멤버십(MM-W1W1)' AS PD_NM , '2010-1484-21' AS BND_CNTR_REF_ID , '이보영' AS CST_KNM , '2' AS DLQ_MCN , '20221111' AS CNTR_RSG_DT , 43700 AS OJ_AMT , 12000 AS OJ_DT , 21360 AS OJ_BLAM FROM DUAL

/* TODO : 데이터 없음, db 설계 미완료*/ SELECT '202209' AS PERF_DT , '61' AS NMN , 0 AS SL_AMT , 0 AS DP_AMT , 0 AS BZNS_ATAM_BLAM , 23490 AS DLQ_AMT , '5' AS DLQ_MCNT , 120 AS DLQ_ADAMT , 120 AS DLQ_ADD_DP , 0 AS DLQ_ADD_BLAM FROM DUAL

/* TODO : 데이터 없음, db 설계 미완료*/ SELECT 23490 AS OJ_AMT , 0 AS RSG_BOR_AMT , 23490 AS DLQ_AMT , 1638890 AS SL_AGG_AMT , 0 AS OJ_DT , 0 AS LSFE , 0 AS DLQ_DP_AMT , 1638890 AS DP_AGG , 23490 AS OJ_BLAM , '2' AS DLQ_MCN , 23490 AS DLQ_BLAM , 60030 AS DSC_AGG , 23490 AS UC_AMT , 0 AS THM_CHRAM_AMT , 0 AS DLQ_ADD_AMT , 0 AS CTR_AGG , 0 AS UC_DP , 0 AS THM_CHRAM_DP_AMT , 20 AS DLQ_ADD_DP_AMT , 23490 AS UC_BLAM , 0 AS CHRAM_BLAM , 990 AS ADD_BLAM FROM DUAL

/* TODO : 데이터 없음, db 설계 미완료*/ SELECT 23490 AS CCAM_TAM , 0 AS ACU_DP , 23490 AS RENTAL_RNTF , 1638890 AS BOR_DP , 0 AS BND_NPD , 0 AS CSMB_CS , 0 AS BOR_BLAM , 1638890 AS RGST_CS_DSC , 23490 AS REQD_CS , '2' AS SL_AMT , 23490 AS UC_AMT , 60030 AS LSFE FROM DUAL

/* TODO : 데이터 없음, db 설계 미완료*/ SELECT 100000 AS REG_FEE , 30900 AS RTLFE1_MM_CHRAM , '3년 약정' AS RTLFE_DUTY_PTRM , '2022-06-01' AS REQD_RQDT , 100000 AS RGST_COST_DSC , 0 AS RTLFE1_DSC , '중고보상' AS PD_DC_CLASS , '2022-05-15' AS CANC_DT , 1854000 AS RNTL_TOTAL , 60 AS RTLFE1_MCNT , '속성값 필요' AS DISC_CODE , '렌탈' AS LEASE_DV , 0 AS RTLFE2_MM_CHRAM , 3 AS MNGT_PRD_MCNT , '2020-123456789-01' AS ONE_PLUS_ONE_LK_CNTR , 0 AS RTLFE2_DSC , '2022-1234567-03' AS PAR_CNTR , '2020-123456789-01' AS ALNC_LK_CNTR , 0 AS RTLFE2_MCNT , '2022-06-01' AS SL_DT , 15200 AS MM_SSPCS , '속성값 필요' AS DISC_CODE2 , '2018-07-19' AS WDWAL_DT , 3 AS VST_PRD , 12 AS STPL_MCNT , 0 AS DSC_AMT , '2018-07-25' AS VST_DT , 3 AS MNGT_PRD , '2016-07-01' AS J_DT , 25 AS VST_NMN , 0 AS FRISU_MSH , 540000 AS SALE_PRICE , 0 AS TK_AMT , 60 AS ISTM_MCNT , 0 AS FRISU_AS , 540000 AS CNTRCT_AMT , 540000 AS ISTM_AMT , 0 AS RECAP_MSH , 0 AS SBSCM , 9000 AS MM_INTAM FROM DUAL
